trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller en anpassningsbar aktivitet designytan för användare att ändra visuellt på ett arbetsflöde designytan.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The FreeformActivityDesigner allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]FreeformActivityDesigner tillåter användare att ändra hur en aktivitet visas på ett arbetsflöde designytan.

trans-unit.source: When you associate FreeformActivityDesigner with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.
trans-unit.target: När du associerar FreeformActivityDesigner med en anpassad klass med den `Designer` attributet utseendet för den anpassade aktiviteten skiljer sig från andra aktiviteter när användaren släpper den anpassade aktiviteten till en designytan.

trans-unit.source: Once FreeformActivityDesigner displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
trans-unit.target: När FreeformActivityDesigner visas en aktivitet i designvyn användare rita kopplingar till andra aktivitetsdesigners och ändra storlek på designer inom de parametrar som definierats av designytan.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the FreeformActivityDesigner is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Användare kan bara lägga till kopplingar till den anpassade aktiviteten eftersom FreeformActivityDesigner är associerad med aktiviteten på den översta nivån i ett arbetsflöde.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> att hjälpmedelsprogram använder för att justera programgränssnitt för användare som har försämringar.

trans-unit.source: If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Om inget `AccessibleObject` är kopplad till kontrollen, skapa en ny instans av en.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Att hämta eller ange den `AccessibilityObject` egenskap, måste du lägga till en referens till sammansättningen hjälpmedel installeras med .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]tillgängliga objekt finns i avsnittet Active Accessibility i MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> associeras med kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Adds a connector to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en koppling till den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: AddConnector is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: AddConnector anropas när en användare lägger till en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>till <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plats att börja kopplingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plats för att slutföra kopplingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> som har lagts till i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: source or target contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: sourceeller target innehåller en referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The property for source or target contains a reference ().
trans-unit.target: The property for source or target contains a reference ().

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is not the container for the connector to add.
trans-unit.target: Aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> inte är behållare för kopplingen för att lägga till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> storlek ändras automatiskt när en användare ändrar storlek på designer underordnad Designer.

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSize, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: När du anger AutoSize layouten för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>uppdateras.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> storlek ändras automatiskt, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger marginalstorlek ska renderas runt underordnade designers när den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> storlek automatiskt.

trans-unit.source: The default size of AutoSizeMargin is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standardstorleken för AutoSizeMargin är en <xref:System.Drawing.Size>objekt med dimensioner för 40 x 40 pixlar.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, AutoSizeMargin settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>som är associerade med det aktuella arbetsflöde temat egenskapen `true`, AutoSizeMargin inställningar är halva höjden och halva bredden för rutnätets storlek.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMargin, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: När du anger AutoSizeMargin layouten för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>uppdateras.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerar storleken på marginal ska renderas runt underordnad Designer för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> inställningar för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of AutoSizeMode allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Standardbeteendet för AutoSizeMode kan den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>att växa som krävs för att anpassas till innehållet, men minskar inte mindre än värdet för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMode, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: När du anger AutoSizeMode layouten för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>uppdateras.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardinställningen är <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Brings the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the top of the z-order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Flyttar den angivna <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> överst i z-ordningen för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: BringToFront modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
trans-unit.target: BringToFront ändrar z-ordningen för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>att visa den angivna <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>som dess övre synliga underordnad designer.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den här metoden för att visa en designer överst i z-ordning när en användare väljer den.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call BringToFront.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`måste vara underordnad den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>innan du anropar BringToFront.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, BringToFront throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Om den inte är utlöser BringToFront <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to bring to the top of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> återinföra överst i z-ordning.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinnehåller en referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerhittades inte i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan skapa en anslutning mellan de angivna kopplingspunkten på en källa underordnad Aktivitetsdesigner och de angivna kopplingspunkten på en target underordnad Aktivitetsdesigner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the source activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> att kontrollera Aktivitetsdesigner källa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> att kontrollera Aktivitetsdesigner mål.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan rita en koppling mellan käll- och aktivitetsdesigners; annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan döljas på ett arbetsflöde designytan.

trans-unit.source: CanExpandCollapse always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar alltid CanExpandCollapse `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan vara dold, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om en användare kan ändra storlek på den angivna underordnade Aktivitetsdesigner i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, CanResizeContainedDesigner returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i härledda klassen CanResizeContainedDesigner returnerar `true` om `containedDesigner` är ett <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Other types of designers cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: Andra typer av designers kan inte ändras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> att kontrollera.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om en användare kan ändra storlek på den angivna Aktivitetsdesigner; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> har lagts till i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorAdded event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>är registrerade ombud händelsehanteraren för händelsen ConnectorAdded.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> locations associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en användare ändrar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> platser som är associerade med en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> visas den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: En koppling ändras när en användare ändrar den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>platser i endera änden av en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>objektet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorChanged event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>är registrerade ombud händelsehanteraren för händelsen ConnectorChanged.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när användaren tar bort en koppling från den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorRemoved event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>är registrerade ombud händelsehanteraren för händelsen ConnectorRemoved.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en skrivskyddad samling kopplingar som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: En koppling är den rad som visas i ett arbetsflöde designytan som ansluter en Aktivitetsdesigner till en annan.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En skrivskyddad samling som innehåller alla <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> objekt som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en koppling mellan två angivna punkterna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plats att börja kopplingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plats för att slutföra kopplingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> som har skapats.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de ohanterade resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> och släpper du de hantera resurserna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer is being disposed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the designer is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om designern tas bort; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> om designern är som slutförd.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om användare kan dra och ritar kopplingar i aktiviteten i fritt format designytan.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om användare kan dra och ritar kopplingar i aktiviteten i fritt format designytan; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan ändras visuellt i arbetsflödet designvyn.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>är inställd på `true` och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>är inställd på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing returnerar `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other conditions EnableVisualResizing returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: I alla andra villkor EnableVisualResizing returnerar `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> kan vara visuellt storlek, i annat fall <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det första valbara objektet navigering efter den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: FirstSelectableObject returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
trans-unit.target: FirstSelectableObject returnerar den första underordnade designern i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>samling, eller en `null` referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) om samlingsantalet är noll.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Första valbar objektet i navigeringsfönstret ordningen för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar det första valbara objektet som följer det angivna objektet i ordningen som navigering i aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Object> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Aktuellt <xref:System.Object>i ordningen som navigering.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> uppräkningsvärde som anger navigering ordningen i Designer.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Först valbar som följer den obj parametern i ordningen som navigering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar uppsättning med tecken som visas på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Glyphs returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Specialtecken returnerar ett tecken för varje anslutningsbart underordnad designer hittades i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> som innehåller tecken som visas på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar information om den <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref> vid de angivna koordinaterna i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: HitTest checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: HitTest kontrollerar om platsen har uppstått på en koppling eller någon av underordnade aktivitetsdesigners.

trans-unit.source: If the HitTest occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, HitTest returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
trans-unit.target: Om HitTest inträffar på en underordnad aktivitet som dras till en annan plats, HitTest returnerar information om den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, inte designern flyttas.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som innehåller koordinater i designytan arbetsflöde som du vill samla in information från.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> som innehåller information om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> på angivna koordinater

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> med hjälp av den angivna <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: `Initialize`lägger till en designer egenskapen utökare till den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>att använda förrän designytan förstörs.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som initieras av <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till den angivna skrivskyddad samlingen med aktiviteter i <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> på den angivna platsen i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> som anger platsen för att lägga till aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> skrivskyddad samling som innehåller de aktiviteter som att lägga till den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det sista objektet i valbar navigering efter den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: LastSelectableObject returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: LastSelectableObject returnerar den sista underordnade designern i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>egenskap eller en `null` referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) om den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>inte innehåller några underordnade designers.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som är valbara objektet i ordningen som designer navigering.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger platsen för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> i logiska koordinater.

trans-unit.source: When Location is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
trans-unit.target: När platsen har angetts på grund av storleksändring av användaren i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, designern underhåller den relativa placeringen av dess underordnade designers.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""></xref> that represents the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""> </xref> som representerar platsen för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> i logiska koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar inställningar för minsta storlek för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerar den minsta möjliga storleken för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Flyttar aktiviteter till en angiven plats i designytan.

trans-unit.source: Location to move activities to.
trans-unit.target: Plats för att flytta aktiviteter till.

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the activities to move to `moveLocation.`
trans-unit.target: Samling som innehåller de aktiviteter som att flytta till`moveLocation.`

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Flyttar den angivna <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> till den angivna platsen.

trans-unit.source: MoveContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: MoveContainedDesigner anger nya gränserna för flyttade designer och utför alla nödvändiga layout för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>på arbetsflödet designytan.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call MoveContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`måste vara underordnad den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>innan du anropar MoveContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, MoveContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Om den inte är utlöser MoveContainedDesigner <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to move.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> att flytta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the designer's new location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som representerar den designer ny plats.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinnehåller en referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerhittades inte i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: En koppling ändras när en användare ändrar den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>platser i endera änden av en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>objektet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a child activity is added or deleted from its <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> när en underordnad aktivitet läggs till eller tas bort från dess <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om aktiviteter som lagts till eller tagits bort.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> när en anslutning har upprättats mellan två dess inneslutna aktivitetsdesigners.

trans-unit.source: OnContainedDesignersConnected is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
trans-unit.target: OnContainedDesignersConnected anropas när en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>ritas mellan källa på en av de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>objekt vars finns aktivitetsdesigners som mål på en andra inneslutna Aktivitetsdesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plats att börja kopplingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> plats för att slutföra kopplingen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> när en dra släpp-åtgärden har slutförts inom gränserna för dess designytan.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> som definierar händelseargument igen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> när en dra släpp-åtgärd pågår och användarens muspekaren är innanför kontrollens gränser designern.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> som definierar händelseargument igen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en tangent trycks när designverktyget har tangentbordsfokus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utför layoutuppgifter om du vill placera visuell information och underordnad Designer på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som definierar händelseargument igen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> när storleken på de visuella tips på designers visas av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize returnerar storleken på den aktuella omgivande rektangeln för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>när <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>anges till `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>är inställd på `true` och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>är inställd på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize beräknar och returnerar den nya storleksinställningar för avgränsningsrektangeln.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>är inställd på true och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>inte är inställt på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize returnerar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som definierar händelseargument igen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerar den nya storleken för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> när en användare visuellt ändrar storlek på det i designläge.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>är inställd på `true` och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>är inställd på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing utför alla storleksändring aktiviteter i arbetsflödet designvyn.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>är inställd på `true` och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>är inställd på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing utför layout aktiviteter, men inga storleksändring aktiviteter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>är inställd på `false`, alla inkluderade designers behålla sina tidigare platser <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"> </xref> som definierar händelseargument igen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> som dess associerade temat har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, OnThemeChange always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i härledda klassen OnThemeChange alltid anger den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>egenskapen till en tom sträng och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A>egenskapen `null` (`Nothing` i Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>är inställd på `true`, platserna för varje underordnad designer i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>är fäst på den närmaste stödlinjen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> som innehåller uppdaterade tema egenskapsinställningar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort den angivna <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> från den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: RemoveConnector deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RemoveConnector tar bort den angivna anslutningen från den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>samling och anropar den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> att ta bort.

trans-unit.source: connector contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: connectorinnehåller en referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Resizes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the dimensions of specified size.
trans-unit.target: Ändrar storlek på den angivna <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> till dimensioner för den angivna storleken.

trans-unit.source: ResizeContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: ResizeContainedDesigner anger nya gränserna för den ändrade designern och utför alla nödvändiga layout för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>på arbetsflödet designytan.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call ResizeContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`måste vara underordnad den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>innan du anropar ResizeContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, ResizeContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Om den inte är utlöser ResizeContainedDesigner <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to resize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> att ändra storlek på.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerar de nya dimensionerna i Designer.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinnehåller en referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerhittades inte i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the bottom of the z-order of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger det angivna <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> längst ned i z-ordningen för den <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SendToBack modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: SendToBack ändrar z-ordningen för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>att visa den angivna <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>som nedre synliga designer i designvyn.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den här metoden för att visa en designer längst ned i z-ordningen när en användare avmarkerar du den.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call SendToBack.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`måste vara underordnad den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>innan du anropar SendToBack.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, SendToBack throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Om den inte är utlöser SendToBack <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to set to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> att ställa in på baksidan av z-ordning.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinnehåller en referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerhittades inte i den samling.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> ritar kopplingar i förgrunden av dess designytan.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ShowConnectorsInForeground always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i en klass som härleds från <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ShowConnectorsInForeground returnerar alltid `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> ritar kopplingar i förgrunden av sin design ytan, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
